title: ambient_temperature_humidity_record
summary: Ambient temperature and humidity measurement recorded at MaMeeFarm using a digital thermometer-hygrometer.
description: This record documents ambient environmental conditions at MaMeeFarm captured via a digital thermometer-hygrometer (HTC-1). The device display shows a temperature of 25.5Â°C and relative humidity of 53% at the recorded time.
